name: UNION OF EUROPEAN PRACTITIONERS IN INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY
legal: a.i.s.b.l (International Non-Profit Association) under Belgian law
goal: Study problems relating to the protection of intellectual property and to the profession of the members of the UNION in the European field, to come to conclusions on these problems, and to convey these conclusions to the authorities and other interested paties.
euInitiatives:
Unitary Patent
Unified Patent Court
EUIPO (EU trademarks and Community design)
IP Harmonisation Directives
